scripts.postinstall: mkdir "./data/development" & npm run resetdb:showcase & npm run check:resetdb & npm run check:resetdb:settings
scripts.resetdb: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && if exist "./data/development/seeds" npx knex seed:run
scripts.check:resetdb: powershell -Command "if (-Not (Test-Path './data/development/gameslist.db3')) { Write-Host 'creating games database...'; npm run resetdb } else { Write-Host 'games database already exists, skipping creation...' }
scripts.resetdb:showcase: npx knex migrate:rollback --env "showcasing" && npx knex migrate:latest --env "showcasing" && npx knex seed:run --env "showcasing"
scripts.resetdb:settings: npx knex migrate:rollback --env "settings" && npx knex migrate:latest --env "settings" && npx knex seed:run --env "settings"
scripts.check:resetdb:settings: powershell -Command "if (-Not (Test-Path './settings/database/settings.db3')) { Write-Host 'creating settings database...'; npm run resetdb:settings } else { Write-Host 'settings database already exists, skipping creation...' }
